title: Edunakk-aridinda
sahitya:
Edunakk-aridinda ulagil dhAtuvardhani tAyE


anupallavi

  sAdhu sngha sankIrtanam pOdumenra buddhi aruLvAi


caraNam    bhUtam karaNam tanmAttirai porundum iyarkkait-tattuvamum
nAdabindu kalaiyum kaDanda vEdAnta sAmrAjyamum
bhEdamillA shuddha mukta samarasa jIvanum aruLi 
vEdamAna OmkAramAi viLanguvAi en uLam kuLiravE
